WorkItem.ClosedComment: Read through the Warlock model. It is using the correct information if you set your Player Level to 85. Do this and your on screen info will look correct again
WorkItem.Description: It appears based on my review that the stat values used by the display (and possibly display) of Hit and probably Crit are based off of level 80 players.  I'm not 1300+ over hit cap, thanks; and I don't think I have a 51% crit chance - though I did reforge my blues before I logged last night, so who knows.

Comments.Message: Erstyx, if any stat conversions are being set inside Warlock without using the StatConversion class from base, please update to that instead. This prevents the issue of using old conversion rates when they change.
